```{r setup}
library(hjl246)
```

## Task 1

```{r}
roads <- st_read(system.file("extdata/roads.geojson", package = "geospaar"))

districts_alb <- read_sf(system.file("extdata/districts.geojson", 
                                 package = "geospaar")) %>% 
  st_transform(x = ., crs = st_crs(roads))

farmers_alb <- read_csv(system.file("extdata/farmer_spatial.csv", 
                                   package = "geospaar")) %>% 
  distinct(uuid, x, y, season) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("x", "y")) %>% 
  st_set_crs(st_crs(roads))
```

## Task 2

```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=6, fig.align = "center"}
library(sf)
par(mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0))
plot_sf(x = districts_alb)
sf::plot(x = v1, y = v2, data = districts_alb, col = "grey")
sf::plot(roads, col = "red")
sf::plot(farmers_alb, col = "blue")
sf::plot()
sf::plot(districts_alb)
??plot.sf

```

## Task 3

```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=6, fig.align = "center"}
ggplot() + geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = districts_alb, fill = "grey") +
  geom_sf(data = roads, col = "red") +
  geom_sf(data = farmers_alb, pch = "+", size = 3, col = "blue") +
  theme_bw()
  

```
